level.heading: Forensic consumers.
level.text: Nothing in this chapter is intended to abridge the rights of persons committed to the care of the Department by order of the court in a criminal proceeding.

level.heading: Emergency Legislation
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 203 of Mental Health Service Delivery Reform Congressional Review Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-144, October 23, 2001, 48 DCR 9947).

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 14-56
level.text: For Law 14-56, see notes following ยง 7-1231.01.
